title: IMAGE detail page - Essentials
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want each IMAGE to have a dedicated page\
So I can find every piece of information about it in one place
description:
# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* the page displays
  * the name of the image as a headline h1
  * the name of the image within the page title (might incl. other information like the node type or the more cars title)
  * a fact sheet section with all properties listed up
    * empty properties are marked as such
  * the image in a sensible size (not a thumbnail, not full size)
* an appropriate message is shown when there exists no image with the given ID

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* logo
* main navigation
* summary text
* relationships
